job.title: Machine Learning Engineer/Python
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongA financial company that originally began in the NYC area has expanded their operations to the West Coast specifically Irvine CA Theyre looking for a Midlevel Machine Learning Engineer The company itself helps to provide personalized financial services and options to small businesses They have created a unique technology platform that is also offered to clients along with their notable customer servicebrbrThe candidate must have at least 2 years of experience in Machine LearningData Engineering You will be an integral part of the team while working closely with the Director of Analytics as well as other members of the team This candidate strongumustustrong be local to the Orange County area and unfortunately cannot provide sponsorship at this timebrbrstronguRequired Skills amp ExperiencebrustrongulliBachelors degree in StatisticsAnalyticsComputer Science or related fieldliliA minimum of 2 years of experienceliliLocal to OCLA arealiliMost experience writing productiondeployment code using RPythonliliDevelop deep learning modelsbrliulstronguDesired Skills amp ExperiencebrustrongulliExperience in classification detection segmentationliliMore than 2 years of experiencebrliulWhat You Will Be DoingbrbrTech Breakdownbrulli50 Codinglili50 ModelingbrliulDaily Responsibilitiesbrulli70 Hands Onlili30 Team CollaborationbrliulThe OfferbrulliCompetitive Salary Up to 150Kyear DOEbrliulstronguYou Will Receive The Following BenefitsbrustrongulliMedical Insurance amp Health Savings Account HSAlili401kliliPaid Sick Time LeaveliliPretax Commuter BenefitbrliulApplicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a fulltime basis now and in the futurebrbrstrongPosted Bystrong Niki Strutzel
